name: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku 3
overview: Pachi-Slot Aruze Oukoku 3 is a pachi-slot (gambling machine) game that features 4 different gambling machines (Versus, Nine, Porcano 2 & Gran-Ciel) and different levels of zoom. The game got 2 different game modes (free play mode and practice mode) and there is also the compare data of the machines and also a CG Gallery.
